subject: Re: [junit] unit testing web services.
msgSnippet: Narasimha, JUnit directly does not test web services, you have to use other frameworks, but it depends on your environment and the container you are using. Are
messageBody:
Narasimha,

JUnit directly does not test web services, you have to use other frameworks, but it depends on your environment and the container you are using.
Are you using J2EE, or ASP ?
Thanks,
-Kamal.




________________________________
From: Narasimha <narasimha_rangudu@...>
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, November 23, 2008 9:34:05 PM
Subject: [junit] unit testing web services.


Hi All ,

Can any one help in letting me know how Junit fits in unit testing java web services.As I am newbie in this area seeking help from the experts out here .

Regards,
- Narasimha -
